tools.name: Appsmith
tools.description: Appsmith is an open-source developer tool that enables the rapid development of these applications. You can drag and drop pre-built widgets to build UI. Connect securely to your databases & API using its datasources.

tools.name: Tooljet
tools.description: Tooljet is an open-source low-code framework that enables building powerful applications with ease. Its intuitive low-code platform accelerates development, enabling rapid deployment and customization without extensive coding knowledge

tools.name: Webflow
tools.description: Webflow transforms web design with its low-code platform. Build responsive, custom websites visually with powerful tools, without needing to code, for a seamless design-to-launch experience

tools.name: Framer
tools.description: Framer revolutionizes design and development with its low-code platform. Create stunning, interactive web and mobile apps effortlessly, combining powerful design tools with intuitive development capabilities.

tools.name: Bubble
tools.description: Bubble offers a no-code solution for building web applications. It allows designing, developing, and launching complex apps with a visual interface, enabling rapid deployment and seamless customization.

tools.name: Retool
tools.description: Retool streamlines app development with its low-code platform. Quickly build and deploy custom applications using pre-built components and integrations, empowering teams to work smarter, faster.
